TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CborUtils extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Utility methods for reading simple string values from CBOR-encoded maps used within Signing Transparency receipts and responses. Methods are defensive: on invalid input, key absence, or unexpected CBOR shapes they return an empty string instead of throwing, allowing callers to decide whether absence is an error condition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
public static string GetStringValueFromCborMapByKey (byte[] cborBytes, int key);
.method public static hidebysig string GetStringValueFromCborMapByKey(unsigned int8[] cborBytes, int32 key) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetStringValueFromCborMapByKey (cborBytes As Byte(), key As Integer) As String
static member GetStringValueFromCborMapByKey : byte[] * int -> string

Docs.param: The CBOR payload (byte array) whose root element is expected to be a map. Null or empty data returns empty string.
The integer map key whose associated text string value should be returned.
Docs.summary: Reads a CBOR-encoded map and returns the text string value associated with the specified integer key.
Docs.returns: The string value associated with the key if present; otherwise an empty string if the key is absent, the value is not a text string, or the CBOR payload is invalid/not a map.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetStringValueFromCborMapByKey (byte[] cborBytes, string key);
.method public static hidebysig string GetStringValueFromCborMapByKey(unsigned int8[] cborBytes, string key) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetStringValueFromCborMapByKey (cborBytes As Byte(), key As String) As String
static member GetStringValueFromCborMapByKey : byte[] * string -> string

Docs.param: The CBOR payload (byte array) whose root element is expected to be a map. Null or empty data returns empty string.
The map key whose associated text string value should be returned (case-sensitive comparison).
Docs.summary: Reads a CBOR-encoded map and returns the text string value associated with the specified key.
Docs.returns: The string value associated with the key if present; otherwise an empty string if the key is absent, the value is not a text string, or the CBOR payload is invalid/not a map.
